item.title: 美联储主席珀利称美联储不久将开始购买资产
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的罗伯托-佩里（Roberto Perli）表示，隔夜融资成本的上升表明银行储备不再充裕，美国央行 "不必等待太久 "就会购买资产以维持理想的流动性水平。【原文：Rising overnight funding costs are signaling that bank reserves are no longer abundant, and the US central bank “won’t have to wait long” before purchasing assets to sustain desired liquidity levels, according to the Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s Roberto Perli.】

item.title: 芝加哥银行家希望通过抛售美国国债来对抗特朗普
item.description: 芝加哥财长 Melissa Conyears-Ervin 周三提议该市停止投资美国国债，以抗议唐纳德-特朗普总统加大移民执法力度和部署军队，招致一些同事的批评，称该计划 "鲁莽"。【原文：Chicago Treasurer Melissa Conyears-Ervin on Wednesday proposed the city stop investing in US Treasuries to protest President Donald Trump’s increased immigration enforcement and deployment of troops, drawing criticism from some colleagues who called the plan “reckless.”】

item.title: 前经纪人承认内幕交易计划源于大流行病
item.description: 斯巴达资本证券公司（Spartan Capital Securities）的一名前经纪人承认，在大流行病期间，他的一位朋友从他女朋友的电脑中窃取了敏感的合并信息，并据此进行了内幕交易。【原文：A former Spartan Capital Securities broker admitted to insider trading based upon sensitive merger information stolen by a friend from his girlfriend’s computer while the pair were working at home during the pandemic.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会权衡美国国债中央清算规则的下一步措施
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构正在考虑如何缓解市场如何过渡到一项要求对冲基金、银行和其他从事美国国债交易的公司集中清算更多交易的全面规则。【原文：Wall Street’s top regulator is considering ways to ease how the market transitions to a sweeping rule requiring hedge funds, banks, and other firms trading in US Treasuries to centrally clear more of their trades.】

item.title: 与 CoreWeave 绑定的数据中心债务考验充斥市场的实力
item.description: 债务投资者对旨在为数据中心建设提供资金的最新垃圾债券交易持更加谨慎的态度。【原文：Debt investors are taking a more cautious view of the latest junk bond deal aimed at funding data center construction.】

item.title: 银行在价值 1100 亿澳元的澳大利亚大宗交易繁荣中承担巨大风险
item.description: 全球金融业竞争最激烈的角落之一正变得更加极端，因为银行家们冒着巨大的风险，要在澳大利亚利润丰厚的大宗交易中击败对手。【原文：One of the most competitive corners of global finance is becoming even more extreme as bankers take big risks to outmaneuver rivals for lucrative block trades in Australia.】

item.title: 支出法案》禁止销售多种大麻制造的 THC 饮料
item.description: 大麻提取的四氢大麻酚饮料有望成为政府支出法案的受害者，结束创纪录的长期停摆。【原文：Hemp-derived THC drinks are poised to be victims of the government spending bill ending the record-long shutdown.】

item.title: 中期选举前阿根廷通胀略有回升
item.description: 由于哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政党面临着严峻的中期选举，阿根廷上个月的物价上涨符合预期。【原文：Prices in Argentina picked up in line with expectations last month as President Javier Milei’s party faced a crunch midterm election.】

item.title: 中国如何在与美国的贸易争端中利用大豆作为武器
item.description: 大豆一直是中美贸易战的导火索，而中国是世界上最大的油籽进口国。在新收获季节开始时，东亚国家抵制美国大豆。10 月下旬，在中美两国斡旋达成更大规模的贸易协议的同时，中国的大豆订单激增，此后，中国对美国大豆的采购再次陷入停滞。【原文：Soybeans have been a flashpoint in the trade war between the US and China, the world’s largest importer of the oilseed. To begin the new harvest season, the East Asian nation boycotted American soybeans. After a flurry of orders from China in late October – which coincided with a larger trade agreement brokered by the two countries – China’s purchases of US soybeans again stalled.】

item.title: 雪佛龙计划大幅增加石油产量，希望阿根廷进行税制改革
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）呼吁阿根廷政府降低税收和放松资本管制，并制定了一项计划，在未来十年内将这个南美国家的产量提高两倍。【原文：Chevron Corp. called on Argentina’s government to lower taxes and relax capital controls as it laid out a plan to triple production from the South American country over the next decade.】

item.title: 美国因伊朗武器问题制裁从中国到印度的企业
item.description: 作为特朗普政府对德黑兰 "最大施压 "行动的一部分，美国制裁了亚洲和中东国家数十家支持伊朗弹道导弹和无人机制造业的公司和人员。【原文：The US sanctioned dozens of firms and people supporting Iran’s ballistic missile and drone manufacturing industry across countries in Asia and the Middle East as part of the Trump administration’s “maximum pressure” campaign against Tehran.】

item.title: 白宫称不太可能公布 10 月份就业和消费价格指数
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周三表示，由于政府关门，10月份的就业和消费者物价指数报告不太可能公布。【原文：The October jobs and consumer price index reports are unlikely to be released due to the government shutdown, White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said Wednesday.】

item.title: 加拿大央行酝酿将降息推迟至卡尼发表预算案之后
item.description: 加拿大央行官员讨论了推迟降息的问题，直到他们获得有关马克-卡尼总理的预算案和美国贸易政策的更多细节。【原文：Bank of Canada officials discussed delaying a rate cut until they had more details about Prime Minister Mark Carney’s budget and US trade policy.】

item.title: 美国高等级债券销售创 2020 年以来新高
item.description: 随着企业利用较低的借贷成本进行债务再融资、为收购提供资金以及投资人工智能项目，美国投资级公司债券的年销售量达到了历史第二高水平。【原文：Annual US investment-grade corporate bond sales have reached their second-highest level ever as companies capitalize on lower borrowing costs to refinance debt, fund acquisitions and invest in AI initiatives.】

item.title: 周五夜光》债券失利，低税率战胜橄榄球
item.description: 在德克萨斯州各地的地方选票上，橄榄球和小政府之间又进行了一次选举日复赛。小政府获胜。【原文：It was another Election Day rematch between football and small government on local ballots all across Texas. Small government won.】

item.title: 法官称亚历山大兄弟必须面对性交易指控
item.description: 在法官驳回了寻求驳回对前豪华房地产经纪人塔尔-亚历山大（Tal Alexander）和奥伦-亚历山大（Oren Alexander）及其兄弟阿隆-亚历山大（Alon Alexander）的刑事指控的大部分辩护理由后，对他们的性交易指控可以继续进行。【原文：The prosecution of former luxury real estate brokers Tal and Oren Alexander and their brother Alon Alexander on sex-trafficking charges can proceed, after a judge rejected most of the defense arguments seeking to dismiss criminal allegations against them.】

item.title: 财政部长称意大利债务是未来评级的挑战
item.description: 财政部主任里卡多-巴尔比耶里（Riccardo Barbieri）表示，意大利受到评级公司的称赞，但可能会发现高债务限制了未来的评级上调。【原文：Italy is being lauded by ratings companies but may find high debt restrains future upgrades, according to Treasury chief Riccardo Barbieri.】

item.title: 亿万富翁萨德收购家乐福股份，半岛集团退出
item.description: 随着巴西半岛集团（Peninsula）出售股份，法国亿万富翁萨德（Saadé）家族正在成为连锁超市家乐福（Carrefour SA）的主要股东。【原文：France’s billionaire Saadé family is becoming an anchor shareholder in supermarket chain Carrefour SA, as Brazil’s Peninsula sells its stake.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：谷歌在新闻排名方面面临欧盟竞争调查
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引未具名官员的话报道称，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌在欧洲面临新一轮竞争调查，原因是谷歌在搜索结果中对新闻机构的排名方式。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google faces a fresh competition probe in Europe over the way it ranks news outlets in its search results, the Financial Times reported, citing unnamed officials.】

item.title: 贝森特承诺 "逐步 "改变债务发行方式
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）按照以往的惯例表示，财政部准备根据投资者需求模式的变化，改变其出售的美国国债类型，但任何改变都将是渐进的，以防止扰乱市场。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, in keeping with past practice, said his department is prepared to alter the types of US Treasury securities it sells in response to evolving patterns of investor demand, though any changes will be gradual in order to prevent roiling markets.】

item.title: Braskem 公司现金短缺，债权人在付款前忧心忡忡
item.description: 石油化工公司 Braskem Idesa SAPI 的现金储备在即将到来的票息支付前骤然减少，引发了投资者对拉美又一次企业崩溃的担忧。【原文：Investors are on edge as petrochemical firm Braskem Idesa SAPI’s cash reserves crumble ahead of a looming coupon payment, stoking fears of another corporate meltdown in Latin America.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称通胀仍是更明显、更紧迫的风险
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，通胀仍然是经济面临的更大风险，他赞成在央行明确有望实现2%的目标之前保持利率稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said inflation remains the greater risk to the economy, and he favors keeping rates steady until it is clear the central bank is on track to reach its 2% goal.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司面临爱尔兰媒体监管机构的调查
item.description: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 展开调查，称该公司未能删除用户举报的非法内容。【原文：Ireland’s media regulator has opened an investigation into Elon Musk’s social media platform X, saying that the company is failing to remove content users report as illegal.】

item.title: Vista 着眼于米莱改革，力争将阿根廷页岩油产量翻番
item.description: Vista Energy SAB 是阿根廷新兴页岩区的顶级钻井商之一，在自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在中期选举中取得决定性胜利后，该公司将哈维尔-米莱伊的新一轮改革视为实现增长的蹦床。【原文：Vista Energy SAB, one of the top drillers in Argentina’s burgeoning shale patch, sees another round of reforms from Javier Milei as a trampoline to growth after the libertarian president notched a decisive win in midterm elections.】

item.title: 印度批准向受美国严厉关税打击的出口商提供 50 亿美元援助
item.description: 就在两国继续努力达成贸易协议之际，印度宣布为遭受美国高额关税打击的出口商提供价值超过 50 亿美元的救济措施。【原文：India announced relief measures worth more than $5 billion for its exporters pummeled by steep US tariffs, even as the two nations continue working toward a trade deal.】
